body_html:
I don't think that'd work:

  1. We want to be able to get the properties of devices other than the "current device"
  2. I don't see why we should be concerned with speed here... do you know of cases where DataParallel modules would be instantiated in a loop?

body:
~~I don't think that'd work:~~

1. ~~We want to be able to get the properties of devices other than the "current device"~~
2. I don't see why we should be concerned with speed here... do you know of cases where `DataParallel` modules would be instantiated in a loop?
